LanguageData.Gun_Wardrone.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Wardrone.label: guardian rifle
LanguageData.Gun_Wardrone.description: A gun turret that uses ammo similar to that of a standard rifle.
LanguageData.Gun_escort_rifle.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_escort_rifle.label: escort gun
LanguageData.Gun_escort_rifle.description: An escort gun used by support drones.
LanguageData.Gun_missilerone.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_missilerone.label: missile battery
LanguageData.Gun_missilerone.description: A missile battery used by missile drones.
LanguageData.Bullet_missilerone.label: missile
LanguageData.Gun_ER_Snipe.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ER_Snipe.label: Heat Rail Sniper Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_ER_Snipe.description: A lightweight sniper rifle for the Sniper Drone's front rail.
LanguageData.Gun_ER_machine_gun.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ER_machine_gun.label: Heat Rail Small Autocannon
LanguageData.Gun_ER_machine_gun.description: It is an autocannon used by large drones or armored vehicles. A weapon that fires accelerating armor-piercing bullets, destroying enemy armor at high speed.
LanguageData.observation_Scope.label: aiming light source
LanguageData.observation_Scope.description: It is a marker aiming light device.\n\nIncreases the marker aiming range, and takes aim at an enemy to create a flash blast that takes away the sight of enemies.
LanguageData.observation_Scope.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.observation_Scope.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.observation_equipment.label: observation equipment
LanguageData.observation_equipment.description: This is a support observation device.\n\nFor support of mechanists, this device strengthens marker range and increases the mechanoid's bandwidth. Although it has no combat power, it causes a flash explosion at enemies aimed with observation devices to blind them.
LanguageData.observation_equipment.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.observation_equipment.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.flash_explosion.label: glare
LanguageData.Gun_medium_missile_launcher.label: medium missile launcher
LanguageData.Gun_medium_missile_launcher.description: A missile launcher used by heavy armored drones, specialized in anti-tank warfare or anti-bunker warfare.
LanguageData.Bullet_missile_launcher.label: missile
LanguageData.Overwatch_tactical_submachinegun.label: moonlight tactical submachine gun
LanguageData.Overwatch_tactical_submachinegun.descrip: A tactical submachine gun for mechanists.\n\n A submachine gun used by combat mechanists. It has a bandwidth-enhancing feature so you can fight alongside mechs.
LanguageData.Overwatch_Tactical_Carbine.label: moonlight tactical carbine
LanguageData.Overwatch_Tactical_Carbine.description: A combat carbine for mechanists.\n\nThis carbine fires 2 rounds at once, and is also equipped with a device to increase bandwidth.
LanguageData.Overwatch_Tactical_Carbine.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Overwatch_Tactical_Carbine.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_highanglegun.label: airburst elevation gun
LanguageData.Gun_highanglegun.description: A type of mortar weapon that fires at high angles.
LanguageData.Gun_highanglegun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_highanglegun.tools.1.label: barrel
